synopsis.text: Kei Nagai is a high school student who discovers he is an "Ajin" - an immortal human. When Kei is killed in a traffic accident, he revives, revealing his status as an Ajin to the world. Governments and the public now see Kei as an inhuman test subject to be hunted down and experimented on. Kei goes on the run, trying to hide his identity while fighting for survival against those that would capture him. He gets embroiled in a battle between human forces and extremist Ajin led by Satou, an old acquaintance from Kei's childhood. Satou has embraced his immortality and aims to wage war on humankind. The story follows Kei's struggles to evade capture and understand more about his newfound immortality. It explores the discrimination Kei faces as an Ajin and the complex moral territory he navigates in choosing allies and enemies. Action and intrigue intensify as human-Ajin tensions erupt into open conflict.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
